Fine, sir. I'll get him started on some snappy Sinbad-esq material. Hee hee! I'm so funny! This is gonna be great. What are you doin'? I'm writing a delicious send up of Mr. Burns for his birthday party. Is poo poo one word or two? I don't think it's a good idea to humiliate your boss on his birthday. Hmm, better sew that eye back on. No. Let's send Burns the eye in the mail. He'll pay more money if he thinks the bear is in danger. Yes. We'll send the eye. I'm sure he'll offer us a fair reward. And then we'll make him double it. Well why can't I be greedy once in awhile? Bobo! My beautiful Bobo! I promise I'll never leave you behind again. Ah, yes.
